text: Deniece Williams (born June 3, 1950 in Gary, Indiana) is an American Grammy Award winning musician and singer-songwriter. She has had many hit records. She is best known for the 1980s song Let's Hear it for the Boy. The single that came out in 1984. ==References== Category:Musicians from Gary, Indiana Category:Singers from Illinois Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:African-American singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:1950 births Category:Living people
title: Deniece Williams
